User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:9.0a1) Gecko/20110912 Firefox/9.0a1
Build ID: 20110912030829

Steps to reproduce:

Reply with original quoted text & a default blue font color, size & type.


Actual results:

Quoted text turns blue too.


Expected results:

I want to use a default color for mail composition, 
but don't want original messages colors to be changed 
to my default composition color or font size or even type. 
tb should respect original messages (senders) own color codes
& shouldn't overwrite them.
comments.author: peuktreuk@hotmail.com
